thread.title: Katy Perry on Her Break From Music: "It's Called Taking Care of Your Mental Health"
thread.title_full: Katy Perry on Her Break From Music: "It's Called Taking Care of Your Mental Health"

author: Monica Sisavat
title: Katy Perry on Her Break From Music: "It's Called Taking Care of Your Mental Health"
text:
Katy Perry at the 2017 Grammys Katy Perry on Her Break From Music: "It's Called Taking Care of Your Mental Health"   Katy Perry on Her Break From Music: "It's Called Taking Care of Your Mental Health" 
If anyone knows how to make an entrance, it's Katy Perry . On Sunday, the singer shone bright like the star that she is when she arrived at the Grammy Awards in LA. In addition to showing off her new platinum blond 'do and talking about her upcoming album, Katy opened up about her recent break from music to Ryan Seacrest , saying, "It's called taking care of your mental health." She also touched on her upcoming performance and said it's "unlike anything I've ever done." One thing's for sure: if it's anything like her new single "Chained to the Rhythm ," it's gonna be good.
